desc: Founded by a working Mom, Liweli aims to help you achieve A Life Well Lived. Liweli offers a variety of calming products including Drink Mixes, Gummies, Stress Melts and more.

layout.text: We proudly introduce our new Drink Mixes. With upgraded ingredients and flavor notes, our New Liweli Drink Mixes will be sure to dazzle your taste buds (and wallet at its new lower cost!)
